scripts.launch:dynamo: sudo docker network create sam-network && sudo docker run -p 8000:8000 --name dynamodb-local --network sam-network amazon/dynamodb-local
scripts.init-db: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=accessKeyId AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=secretAccessKey aws dynamodb create-table --table-name Reminders --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --region eu-north-1
scripts.start: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=accessKeyId AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=secretAccessKey sudo -E sam local start-api --env-vars env.json --region eu-north-1 --docker-network sam-network
scripts.deploy-webapp: cd app && yarn build && cd .. && aws --profile AdministratorAccess-245826160985 s3 sync ./app/build/ s3://simple-reminders-app-bucket-245826160985-eu-north-1
